polisiyata paminili kara winadi kipayakin yalith thamanta pera paridi maraniya tharjana ella wimath, rajayata sambandha kipadenekuma labunu durakathana paniwuda gana uwamanawata wada thamangen wimasima nisath, me maraniya tharjana thamanta ella wuye rajayata sambandha pirisakagen bawata sakayak hatagena athi wagada manthriwaraya wadi duratath pawasiya.me sambandhayen adahas dakwu kilinochchiya polisiye ihala niladhariyeku prakasha kale manthriwarayage paminillehi sandahan thorathuru adhikaranayata idiripath kota durakathana anka himi pirisa soya owunta danduwam laba dena bawayi.
